title: Mateusz Archiciński / Front-End Developer
description: Website of Mateusz Archiciński Front-End Developer, a freelancer from the vicinity of Warsaw. Providing services to refresh the present and create new websites/web applications adapted to the latest web standards as well as built on the basis of modern and best-chosen technologies.
keywords: web development,creation of websites,creation of web applications,job,websites,website,web applications,web application,in network,html, css, javascript, nodejs, wordpress, front end developer, front end,project,design,browsers,server
author: Mateusz Archiciński
ogDescription: Website of Mateusz Archiciński Front-End Developer, a freelancer from the vicinity of Warsaw. Providing services to refresh the present and create new websites/web applications adapted to the latest web standards as well as built on the basis of modern and best-chosen technologies.

header.p: A full set of information about me.

p: Hi! My name is Mateusz. I am developing modern websites based on HTML, CSS and JavaScript technologies.

I started my career as a Web Content Editor at one of Warsaw's interactive corporations. This position enabled me to participate in many interesting projects/campaigns conducted for various clients from the Polish and foreign markets. I had the pleasure to meet interesting people and learn a lot.
At the moment, I am looking for a permanent or a remote work, depending on client needs. If you are interested in cooperation contact me!

inWhatAmIGood.title: In what am I good
array: I work in a team and communicates

timelinePoints.title: Individual education
timelinePoints.description: Learning of issues connecting to widely comprehended concepts of front-end and web design.

timelinePoints.title: Education: Higher
timelinePoints.description: Engineering studies at the Warsaw University of Life Sciences, a field of study: Informatics, specialization: Computer Systems.

timelinePoints.title: Education: Secondary
timelinePoints.description: Completion of education at the Maria Sadzewiczowa High School in Łochów on a mathematical-informatic profile.

timelinePoints.title: Front-End Developer / Freelancer
timelinePoints.description: Short-term job orders to be completed remotely.

timelinePoints.title: Web Content Editor in K2 Internet S.A.
timelinePoints.description: My main responsibilities included serving various content management systems on the Web, creating a campaign/product pages, landing page, and mailings, as well as automating work using js/nodejs scripts on server/client side.

timelinePoints.title: Office worker / Apprentice in GUS
timelinePoints.description: Student practice takes place in the Central Statistical Office in Warsaw, activities: tester of an internal training system for GUS employees with access to the Moodle cms.

timelinePoints.title: Office worker in Advocate Office
timelinePoints.description: Contract employment at the Advocate Office, activities performed: office work.

timelinePoints.title: Learning projects
timelinePoints.description: Made and shared projects within learning different technologies. I encourage you to visit my Github.

timelinePoints.title: Online courses
timelinePoints.description: Completion of a large number of online courses in the field of HTML5, Pug, JSON, CSS3, Less, Sass, Bootstrap, Materialize, Foundation, RWD, JS, ES6, jQuery, AngularJS, AJAX, Angular Material, NodeJS, NPM, Bower, Gulp, MongoDB, Mongoose, PHP, WordPress, MySql, Git and Photoshop.

skillsTechnologies.p: Selected skills and technologies which I use in my projects on a daily basis.

header.p: Check out what I can offer you.

services.title: Coding PSD to HTML/CSS/JS
services.description:
Cutting and coding to HTML5, CSS3
and JavaScript of the provided
graphics project for a website,
mailing, WordPress template
and others.

services.title: Customization for various browsers and devices
services.description:
Customization the website
for all or selected browsers
and mobile devices with
different resolutions (so-called
Responsive web design).

services.title: Administration of your websites
services.description:
Implementation and maintenance
of the website/web application
including periodical reports
from automated and manual tests
of all or selected features.

services.title: SPA / Single page applications
services.description:
Creation of an entire web
application client layer or selected
components based on the AngularJS
framework, HTML5, CSS3
and ES6/TypeScript.

services.title: API / Application programming interfaces
services.description:
Creation of an entire web
application server layer or selected
services. Providing access to server
resources over HTTP protocol based
on the Express framework.
